<div><span class="notranslate">After yesterday Google introduced the&nbsp;<b>Search Console Beta version</b>&nbsp;, now Google added&nbsp;<b><a href="http://weblight.in/?lite_url=https://translate.googleusercontent.com/translate_c%3Fdepth%3D2%26nv%3D1%26rurl%3Dtranslate.google.com%26sl%3Did%26sp%3Dnmt4%26tl%3Den%26u%3Dhttps://www.arlinadzgn.com/2018/01/cara-mengaktifkan-adstxt-di-blogger.html%26xid%3D17259,15700021,15700105,15700122,15700124,15700149,15700168,15700173,15700201%26usg%3DALkJrhjM2-ub4BI7rhH19j7jVHing1Hjjg&amp;ts=1519903542&amp;sig=AOyes_SbDMhdnC5uSRN2FB4oOF3A9ffojQ" rel="noopener noreferer nofollow">Ads.txt on Blogger</a></b>&nbsp;.</span>&nbsp;</div><div class="separator" data-xp="0"><img src="https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-dGUliWFLKSY/WnGd3G8SgyI/AAAAAAAAF90/QMALZVj1V_YrcGf6dhEoCPsfB0DR4DYsACLcBGAs/s1600/Cara%252BMengaktifkan%252BAds%252Btxt%252Bdi%252BBlogger.png"></div><br><h4><span class="notranslate">What is Ads.txt?</span></h4><br><span class="notranslate"><b>Ads.txt</b>&nbsp;is an initiative of the&nbsp;<b>Interactive Advertising Bureau Tech Lab (IAB)</b>&nbsp;to promote and improve transparency in program advertising.</span><span>&nbsp;</span><span class="notranslate">This is an easy way for Adsense publishers to clearly point out to authorized buyers to sell their inventory.</span><span>&nbsp;</span><br><br><span class="notranslate">Actually for Blogger Ads.txt already existed but now you can edit Ads.txt as you wish and for you who get this warning message like this</span><br><blockquote class="tr_bq" data-xp="1"><span class="notranslate">Your earnings are at risk - One or more of your ads.txt files does not contain the AdSense publisher ID.</span>&nbsp;<span class="notranslate">Fix this issue right now to avoid having a serious impact on your revenue.</span></blockquote><br><span class="notranslate">On the&nbsp;<b><a href="http://weblight.in/?lite_url=https://translate.googleusercontent.com/translate_c%3Fdepth%3D2%26nv%3D1%26rurl%3Dtranslate.google.com%26sl%3Did%26sp%3Dnmt4%26tl%3Den%26u%3Dhttps://www.arlinadzgn.com/search/label/AdSense%26xid%3D17259,15700021,15700105,15700122,15700124,15700149,15700168,15700173,15700201%26usg%3DALkJrhiVuClnCFbEy2mcexo9smaP_qcVPQ&amp;ts=1519903542&amp;sig=AOyes_TpNOZRphUWUQXFMN0xGGct7JnI3g" rel="noopener noreferer nofollow">Google Adsense</a></b>&nbsp;dashboard, Google suggests you to enable Ads.txt on your blog.</span><span>&nbsp;</span><br><br><h4><span class="notranslate">How to Enable Ads.txt on Blogger?</span></h4><br><span class="notranslate">To enable Ads.txt on Blogger, you can set it in&nbsp;<b>Blogger Dashboard</b>&nbsp;&gt;&nbsp;<b>Settings</b>&nbsp;&gt;&nbsp;<b>Search preferences</b>&nbsp;&gt;&nbsp;<b>Monetize</b>&nbsp;&gt;&nbsp;<b>custom ads.txt</b>&nbsp;&gt; Then click&nbsp;<b>edit</b>&nbsp;choose&nbsp;<b data-xp="2">Yes</b>&nbsp;and fill in the following code in the ads.txt column</span><span>&nbsp;</span><br><br><div class="separator"><a href="http://weblight.in/?lite_url=https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-S14cM9tftH0/WnGZKHNcPpI/AAAAAAAAF9U/aQzqfNrqcugxa-xxAgle9wKONWAZ6k7xwCLcBGAs/s1600/Cara%252BMengaktifkan%252BAds.png&amp;ts=1519903542&amp;sig=AOyes_TJarN0AoYA6uarEQdakbLLwk-eIQ" rel="noopener noreferer nofollow"><img alt="Cara Mengaktifkan Ads.txt di Blogger" src="data:image/jpeg;base64,"></a></div><br><pre><code class="hljs css"><span class="hljs-selector-tag">google</span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.com</span>, <span class="hljs-selector-tag">pub-0000000000000000</span>, <span class="hljs-selector-tag">DIRECT</span>, <span class="hljs-selector-tag">f08c47fec0942fa0</span></code> </pre><br><span class="notranslate">Replace&nbsp;<kbd>pub-0000000000000000</kbd>&nbsp;with&nbsp;<b>your Adsense ID</b>&nbsp;buddy then click&nbsp;<b>Save changes</b>&nbsp;.</span><span>&nbsp;</span><br><br><span class="notranslate"><b>Adsense IDs</b>&nbsp;can be found in your&nbsp;<b>Google Adsense dashboard</b>&nbsp;like the example below</span><span>&nbsp;</span><br><br><div class="separator"><a href="http://weblight.in/?lite_url=https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Mh-aMdW_YLw/WnGa--HAqDI/AAAAAAAAF9g/07U-gUM2muUdD-5CHH-dKFiG39ZkpgwiQCLcBGAs/s1600/Cara%252BMengaktifkan%252BAds%252Btxt%252Bdi%252BBlogger%252B3.png&amp;ts=1519903542&amp;sig=AOyes_Qa_M4HRPPh0RbPfk6YHobiXGe4MQ" rel="noopener noreferer nofollow"><img alt="Cara Mengaktifkan Ads.txt di Blogger" height="349" src="data:image/jpeg;base64," width="640"></a></div><br><span class="notranslate">To check whether&nbsp;<b>Ads.txt</b>&nbsp;is enabled, you can check in the browser search tab with a link like this</span><span>&nbsp;</span><br><br><pre> <code class="hljs cpp">http:<span class="hljs-comment">//www.domain.com/ads.txt</span></code> </pre><br><span class="notranslate"><kbd>Rename_domain</kbd>&nbsp;with your blog address.</span><span>&nbsp;</span><br><br><blockquote class="tr_bq"><span class="notranslate">For those of you who have blogs with sub domains of the primary domain, you do not need to enable this Ads.txt.</span>&nbsp;<span class="notranslate">Just enough on blogs with the primary domain only enabled</span></blockquote><br><span class="notranslate">Similarly about&nbsp;<b><a href="http://weblight.in/?lite_url=https://translate.googleusercontent.com/translate_c%3Fdepth%3D2%26nv%3D1%26rurl%3Dtranslate.google.com%26sl%3Did%26sp%3Dnmt4%26tl%3Den%26u%3Dhttps://www.arlinadzgn.com/2018/01/cara-mengaktifkan-adstxt-di-blogger.html%26xid%3D17259,15700021,15700105,15700122,15700124,15700149,15700168,15700173,15700201%26usg%3DALkJrhjM2-ub4BI7rhH19j7jVHing1Hjjg&amp;ts=1519903542&amp;sig=AOyes_SbDMhdnC5uSRN2FB4oOF3A9ffojQ" rel="noopener noreferer nofollow">How to Enable Ads.txt in Blogger</a></b>&nbsp;, may be useful.</span><br><div><span class="notranslate"><br></span></div><div><span class="notranslate">Source:&nbsp;<a href="https://www.arlinadzgn.com/2018/01/cara-mengaktifkan-adstxt-di-blogger.html" rel="noopener noreferer nofollow" target="_blank">Arlinadzgn</a></span></div>
